effect.Name: CPU Foilage (Switch)
effect.description: This shader gives a foil effect similar to those on the CPU. This shader was created at the request of GlitchyDust.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo CPU Foilage (Switch) Shader | 1.0 (16.08.2024) */
parameter.description: This shader gives a foil effect similar to those on the CPU. This shader was created at the request of GlitchyDust.

parameter.name: ( Position )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for changing the position in the rainbow.

parameter.name: Position X
parameter.description: A variable that determines the position of the rainbow in the X axis.

parameter.name: Position Y
parameter.description: A variable that determines the position of the rainbow in the Y axis.

parameter.name: ( Rotation )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for changing the rotation in the rainbow.

parameter.name: Rotation X
parameter.description: A variable that determines rotation in the X axis.

parameter.name: ( Points Position )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for changing the position of point.

parameter.name: Point X
parameter.description: A variable that determines point position in the X axis.

parameter.name: Point Y
parameter.description: A variable that determines point position in the Y axis.

parameter.name: ( Texture )
parameter.description: Here are the variables that determine the scale and offset of the texture.

parameter.name: Scale
parameter.description: This variable determines the overall scale of the texture (in X and Y axes).

parameter.name: Scale X
parameter.description: This variable determines the scale of the texture in the X axis.

parameter.name: Scale Y
parameter.description: This variable determines the scale of the texture in the Y axis.

parameter.name: ( Rendering Options )
parameter.description: Here are the options for how the texture should be rendered.

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable manages which color will be reduced. Set to 0 is the blend color will be reduced and set to 1 is the base color will be reduced.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.
